goal_summary: Transform the wildfire nowcast system from region-specific manual ingestion to a global Just-In-Time (JIT) pipeline where clicking any fire triggers automated background ingestion (terrain, weather) and forecast generation, providing worldwide coverage without pre-provisioned databases.

blocked_tasks.title: Add integration test for JIT pipeline end-to-end
blocked_tasks.description: In api/tests/test_jit_forecast_integration.py (new), create a test that: 1) POSTs to /forecast/jit with a small bbox (e.g., 10km x 10km), 2) polls /forecast/jit/{job_id} until completed, 3) asserts forecast results exist and contain valid rasters + contours. Use a small bbox to keep test runtime under 2 minutes. Mark as integration test.
verification: Would run: cd api && uv run pytest tests/test_jit_forecast_integration.py -v
